gov.usgs.anss.edgethread

Class CommandServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgethread.CommandServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class CommandServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    CommandServer.java - This server looks for a telnet type connection, accepts a message of the form command,arg1,arg2\n and execute this command on the creator of this thread through the CommandServerInterface. It can be used to wrap the IP portion and allow its co-class to handle the commands.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandServer

        public CommandServer(java.lang.String tg,
                     int porti,
                     EdgeThread parent,
                     CommandServerInterface obj)
        Creates a new instance of a CommandServer
        Parameters:
        tg - An identifying tag of the creator
        porti - The starting port that will be used for this service .
        parent - A parent EdgeThread for logging
        obj - An object implementing the CommandServerInterface to call to execute commands and get help
